mapper.insert: INSERT INTO yd_company( store_id, user_id, company_name, company_address, company_business_licence, company_organization_code, company_bank_account, legal_person_positive, legal_person_negative ) VALUE( #{store_id}, #{user_id}, #{company_name}, #{company_address}, #{company_business_licence}, #{company_organization_code}, #{company_bank_account}, #{legal_person_positive}, #{legal_person_negative} )
